author: dushshantha
msg: fixed the jira http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AXIS2C-169 - Arrange the parameter list taken by string functions to be consistant

author: jstrachan
msg: fixed the assembly so that the activemq broker script works again. Now moved from a Jetty snapshot to a release (6.1.2rc2) and also made BrokerService.setDataDirectory(String) take a string to avoid strange Spring errors we were getting

author: felixk
msg: Avoid NPE in case of unset workerThreadPools property

author: keithc
msg: Need not set the mepURI here. all axisOperations set the MEPURI explicitly. Setting it here causes problems

author: gshimansky
msg: Fixed bug described in HARMONY-3510 [drlvm][exceptions] DRLVM crashes on LinkageError
The problem is with LinkageError exception object creation. The message
is allocated with alloca, so memory is corrupted after function exits.
When message is corrupted, the message String object cannot be created and
